properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 11:14AM CST until January 24 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
...Slushy light snow accumulations this afternoon through
tonight...

* WHAT...Rain and snow mix, changing to all snow. Slushy
accumulations up to 1 or 2 inches possible. Winds gusting as
high as 25 to 35 mph.

* WHERE...Marion, Chase and Greenwood Counties.

* WHEN...Late afternoon or early evening through about 3 AM
tonight.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM CST FRIDAY
